title: BUG SPLAT PLS HELPPPPP!!!!
body: I did full restoration on my computer and i was able to play maybe 2 games at most then all of a sudden direct x error popped up and i was confused because i was just playing a game earlier before that, not everytime i try to spectate the screen will go black and then my desktop resolution will automatically go 640x860 resoulution the a couple seconds later itll show bugsplat pleas help, i have the latest intel drivers and my directx is 11, all my windows updates are already done

replies.body:
Hey,

For a first step, I'd check out the support article on [Bug Splats and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) - you've already done some of the tips there but it might be a good idea to go through all of them.

If you're still having issues after that - it might be a good idea to send in a [support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)

Mindstar
